title: Tune down Hecarim burst already
body:
It's just ridiculous, with a spell blade item thrown into a full tank build, Hecarim can easily run down any ADC and 1v1 them. Hell, he can 1v3 and walk away easily with his burst. 

Some things they could change to bring him down a bit:
- If you ult with E up, you lose the E charge
- More than half the range of his ult
- Completely remove the damage of his ult (It's already a massive gap closer with a big AoE CC, he doesn't need 400 damage on top of it.
- Tune down some base armor/MR so he's not so tanky if he rushes TForce.
